duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute experiments using scientific principles and statistical approaches to support the development of the platform.
Interface internally and cross-functionally with various departments to implement new processes and technologies as part of the core technology transfer team.
Author high-quality technical documents, procedures, and reports.
Analyze and present technical results at departmental meetings.
Perform routine laboratory activities including equipment qualification/maintenance.
Develop training materials for scientific methods and techniques, train and onboard new hires.
Serve as subject matter expert and provide technical insights and support in troubleshooting and root cause investigations.

education_certification.credential: BS or MS in Bioengineering, Chemical Engineering, Biology, Biochemistry, or related field with 9-15 years of process development experience in the cell and gene therapy field OR PhD in relevant fields with 1-5 years of industry experience in the cell therapy field.
Experience working in a GMP and/or Clinical Manufacturing setting strongly preferred.
